title: Chen: Voters looking to Rubio as an alternative to Trump
itunes:title: Chen: Voters looking to Rubio as an alternative to Trump
description:
Rubio policy adviser Lanhee Chen says Trump would be a problematic president. He joins Tom Keene and Michael McKee on Bloomberg Surveillance.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
